entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Castlegar

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 8:00 PM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: S 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of wet snow and a few rain showers near midnight. Risk of thunderstorms this evening. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:39 PM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow and a few rain showers changing to a few rain showers late in the morning. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:39 PM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:39 PM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
